name: Sarah Matthews
summary: Former White House Deputy Press Secretary who resigned on January 6 and became a key witness before the January 6 Committee, warning Trump is 'unfit for office.'

keyStatements.quote: It was obvious that he had no intention of stopping the violence. He was just trying to appease people.
I thought that the president needed to tell people to go home. I thought that he was the only person who could do that.
Trump is unfit for office and should never be president again.

timeline.event: Became Deputy White House Press Secretary

timeline.significance: Left over Trump's response to riot

credibility.background: Former White House Deputy Press Secretary, witnessed January 6 events firsthand

oppositionReasons: Trump had no intention of stopping January 6 violence

endorsement: Endorsed Kamala Harris for President in 2024
